description.en: Quora is a place to gain and share knowledge. It's a platform to ask questions and connect with people who contribute unique insights and quality answers.
description.ga_IE: Is áit é Quora chun eolas a fháil agus a roinnt. Is ardán é chun ceisteanna a chur agus ceangal a dhéanamh le daoine a chuireann léargas uathúil agus freagraí ardchaighdeáin ar fáil.
